channel.title: Layouts on the forums
channel.description: For the last 2 years or maybe even longer I have been coming to Moparscape every now and then and i always see this ugly layout that they have. I suggest that maybe there could be a option to change your layout. Since I think these forums can get more swagged out if they put some effort in it.

item.title: Layouts on the forums
